alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:01PM EDT until July 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Aroostook County in northern Maine... Somerset County in west central Maine... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 400 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saint Juste, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Saint Juste, Saint Pamphile and Nine-mile Bridge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
